item.title: Masjid Open With Restrictions
item.description: Alḥamdulillāh the Masjid is open and sisters are welcome for the five daily prayers, classes and anytime during the week except jumuʿah at…
item.content:encoded: Alḥamdulillāh the Masjid is open and sisters are welcome for the five daily prayers, classes and anytime during the week except jumuʿah at this time, due to needing their section to accommodate social distancing.

item.title: Construction Complete
item.description: Alḥamdulillāh, through Allāh’s grace and mercy, we’ve finished the construction in the muṣallá areas just in time for Ramaḍān. Please join…
item.content:encoded: Alḥamdulillāh, through Allāh’s grace and mercy, we’ve finished the construction in the muṣallá areas just in time for Ramaḍān. Please join us for Iftar and Tarawīḥ each night during Ramaḍān.
